body_html: This gcc internal compiler error appears to be an out-of-memory event; I experienced this using Ubuntu 14.04.5 in a VMware Fusion VM on Mac OS X with the default 1024MB of memory assigned. Increasing VM memory to 8192MB yielded a successful build.
body_text: This gcc internal compiler error appears to be an out-of-memory event; I experienced this using Ubuntu 14.04.5 in a VMware Fusion VM on Mac OS X with the default 1024MB of memory assigned. Increasing VM memory to 8192MB yielded a successful build.
body: This gcc internal compiler error appears to be an out-of-memory event; I experienced this using Ubuntu 14.04.5 in a VMware Fusion VM on Mac OS X with the default 1024MB of memory assigned. Increasing VM memory to 8192MB yielded a successful build.
